alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Harnett; Hoke; Johnston; Sampson; Scotland; Wayne (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 14 at 3:55AM EDT until March 15 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EDT THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32. For the second Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 expected. * WHERE...Johnston, Harnett, Wayne, Scotland, Hoke, Cumberland and Sampson Counties. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, until 9 AM EDT this morning. For the second Freeze Warning, from midnight tonight to 10 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Cumberland; Harnett; Hoke; Johnston; Sampson; Scotland; Wayne
